Recipe App User Guide
Step 1: Search for Recipes Enter the name of the recipe you are looking for in the search bar. Click on the "Search" button. Step 2: Explore Search Results Browse through the list of recipes that match your search. Step 3: View Recipe Details Click on a recipe to view more details. Explore the full recipe, including the source URL for more information. Step 4: Save/Delete Recipes To save a recipe, simply click on save recipe, and it will be added to your saved recipes. Step 5: Access Help Click on the menu icon (three dots) in the top-right corner. Select "Help" to access additional instructions and tips on using the application
